author: Shannon H
description:
Silent Night, Deadly Night (2025) is the second remake of 1984’s cult classic of the same name. Like the original, it’s a Christmas themed horror flick with a killer dressed as Santa. Unlike the first remake, this is an absolute banger. What’s not to like about a man dressed as Santa going on a killing […]

The post REVIEW: Silent Night, Deadly Night (2025) appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Silent Night, Deadly Night (2025)
